languages.text: Края платформы раскурочены и оплавлены. Судя по всему, ее намеренно подорвали мощной взрывчаткой.

traits.locale_text: Края платформы раскурочены и оплавлены. Судя по всему, ее намеренно подорвали мощной взрывчаткой.

languages.text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. It appears to have been deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.
languages.original_text: Края платформы раскурочены и оплавлены. Судя по всему, ее намеренно подорвали мощной взрывчаткой.

traits.locale_text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. Apparently it was deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.

languages.text: Los bordes de la plataforma están retorcidos y derretidos. Parece haber sido dañado intencionadamente por un poderoso explosivo.
languages.original_text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. It appears to have been deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.

traits.locale_text: Los bordes de la plataforma están retorcidos y derretidos. Parece haber sido dañado intencionadamente por un poderoso explosivo.

languages.text: Les bords de la plateforme sont tordus et fondus. Elle semble avoir été délibérément endommagée par un puissant explosif.
languages.original_text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. It appears to have been deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.

traits.locale_text: Les bords de la plateforme sont tordus et fondus. Elle semble avoir été délibérément endommagée par un puissant explosif.

languages.text: プラットフォームのブリッジは歪んで溶けている。何らかの爆発によって意図的に破壊されたようだ。
languages.original_text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. It appears to have been deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.

traits.locale_text: プラットフォームのブリッジは歪んで溶けている。何らかの爆発によって意図的に破壊されたようだ。

languages.text: 平台的边缘已经扭曲、融化，似乎是被某种强力炸药有意摧毁的。
languages.original_text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. It appears to have been deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.

traits.locale_text: 平台的边缘已经扭曲、融化，似乎是被某种强力炸药有意摧毁的。

languages.text: Die Ränder der Plattform sind verformt und geschmolzen. Sie wurde offenbar durch einen mächtigen Sprengsatz mutwillig beschädigt.
languages.original_text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. It appears to have been deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.

traits.locale_text: Die Ränder der Plattform sind verformt und geschmolzen. Sie wurde offenbar durch einen mächtigen Sprengsatz mutwillig beschädigt.

languages.text: Platformun kenarları yamulmuş ve erimiş. Güçlü bir patlayıcıyla kasıtlı olarak bu hâle getirilmiş gibi.
languages.original_text: The edges of the platform are twisted and melted. It appears to have been deliberately damaged by a powerful explosive.
